title: Fragment of a Statue of King Horemheb
description:
Black granite fragment of a statue of King Horemhab carrying an inscribed staff in left hand. Preserved portion includes only left forearm, adjoining portion of standard and very small area of kilt. Mediocre work.
Condition: Preserved portion in good condition.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
